en.title: Skill Set
en.description: Exploring the diverse range of skills I've acquired and developed:

en.title: Data Analysis
en.description: Effectively sift through large amounts of noise and refine the results to ensure the most important information is presented to users in a clear and concise manner.

en.title: Design Principles
en.description: Craft intuitive, efficient, and scalable frameworks based on accepted best practices and standards to optimize user experience.

en.title: Customer Service
en.description: Provide effective, timely, and friendly support to users with professionalism and courtesy.

en.title: Wireframing
en.description: Create detailed wireframes to visualize and plan user interfaces, effectively laying the foundation for intuitive design.

en.title: Usability Testing
en.description: Enhance user experiences through comprehensive usability testing, including a range of edge cases.

en.title: Prototyping
en.description: Translate concepts into interactive prototypes for testing and refinement.
